Treeptik an innovative company


We develop breakthrough solutions around Java / JEE technologies and the cloud- computing. Innovation is at the heart of Treeptik's strategy. We spend 15 percent of our turnover in Research and Development every year.

Modern Application development

IT technologies are evolving fast. We can help your business to develop modern applications or modernize existing ones. We leverage new trends such as Cloud-computing to deliver business value.

We develop cost-effective cloud applications and services to help your business with reducing risk, lowering costs, speeding time-to-market.
